title: Madeleine Architects
content:
Please help...

I think it has alterations, but I would love to know what font is this.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-22 at 4.36.26 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-22%20at%204.36.26%20PM.png) | 207.08 KB |
author: robotrock

comments.content: some of the glyphs look much like [Identikal Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/www.fonts.com/font/identikal/identikal-sans/complete-family-pack)

and some additional info, from the designer's [site](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/afom.com.au/projects/project/madeleine-blanchfield-architects/#brand-identity)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925im_/http:/typophile.com/files/snap_5871.png)

[ARS Maquette](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/ars_type/ars_maquette_pro_complete) looks like a fair alternative to me.  
Some more: [Theinhardt](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/www.optimo.ch/typefaces_Theinhardt.html), [Suisse BP Int'l](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/swisstypefaces.com/fonts/suisse-bp/all-styles/#suisse-bp-intl)

The font used for the information looks very much like Foundry Monoline (beautiful typeface).

[http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/the-foundry-typefaces/sans/params/foundry-monoline-12/pc-truetype/western-latin-1/bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/the-foundry-typefaces/sans/params/foundry-monoline-12/pc-truetype/western-latin-1/bold)

One more option: [Kiruna](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/talbot/kiruna)

> The font used for the information looks very much like Foundry Monoline

Monoline? Really? I'd prefer [Context](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804230925/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/the-foundry-typefaces/sans/params/foundry-context) for this case...
i think i got lost with everyone talking about the "information". huh? thought we were id'ing the logotype.
Does anyone recognize the font on the information card? Thanks!
